RESOURCE.DESCRIPTION: Helio HEC time based query V1.16.25
RESOURCE.INFO: SELECT stereo_hi_cme.HEC_id,stereo_hi_cme.time_start,stereo_hi_cme.time_end,stereo_hi_cme.instrument,stereo_hi_cme.data_gap,stereo_hi_cme.cme_type,stereo_hi_cme.brightness,stereo_hi_cme.pa,stereo_hi_cme.pa_width,stereo_hi_cme.time_onset,stereo_hi_cme.not_in_list,stereo_hi_cme.v,stereo_hi_cme.long_hg,stereo_hi_cme.long_err,stereo_hi_cme.time_1au,stereo_hi_cme.comment FROM stereo_hi_cme WHERE time_start>='2003-02-01T00:00:00' AND time_start<='2003-02-10T00:00:00' LIMIT 100 OFFSET 0

FIELD.name: time_start
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Start time - approximate time that CME enters HI field of view.

FIELD.name: time_end
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: End time - approximate time CME front leaves HI field of view.

FIELD.name: instrument
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: This is the ID of the instrument on STEREO that was used to identify the event.

FIELD.name: data_gap
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Indication of a data gap during the event

FIELD.name: pa
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Central position angle for the observed CME

FIELD.name: pa_width
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Position angle width of the CME

FIELD.name: time_onset
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Estimated onset time for the event

FIELD.name: not_in_list
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Flag to indicate if the event is in the HI solar event list

FIELD.name: long_hg
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Fitted Stonyhurst longitude of the event

FIELD.name: long_err
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Error in the fitted longitude measurement

FIELD.name: time_1au
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Time at which the CME was expected to reach 1 AU based on fitted time elongation profile
